title: league of legend client won't open
body: when i click league of legend, the league of legend logo pops up like always but it just stays there.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is either having an issue reaching our patching servers or it's not being run with the right permissions. I recommend launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) to ensure League can operate properly with the privileges it requires.

If you experience further issues after taking those steps, let me know.
